sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col
      cols=12
      xs=6
      sm=6
      md=6
      lg=4
      xl=4
    >
      <v-card
        class="ma-3 pa-4"
        outlined
      >
        <v-text-field
          :rules="[(v) => v.length <= 25 || 'Max 25 characters']"
          required
          :counter="25"
          single-line
          label="名前"
        ></v-text-field>
        <v-text-field
          :rules="[(v) => v.length <= 25 || 'Max 50 characters']"
          required
          :counter="25"
          single-line
          label="名前(かな)"
        ></v-text-field>
        <v-radio-group v-model="row" row>
          <v-radio label="男性" value="male"></v-radio>
          <v-radio label="女性" value="female"></v-radio>
        </v-radio-group>      
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn outlined color="primary">新規追加</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>
    <v-col
      v-for="user in users" :key="user.id"
      cols=12
      xs=6
      sm=6
      md=6
      lg=4
      xl=4
    >
      <v-card
        class="ma-3 pa-4"
        outlined
      >
        <v-text-field
          :rules="[(v) => v.length <= 25 || 'Max 25 characters']"
          required
          :counter="25"
          single-line
          v-model="user.name"
          label="名前"
        ></v-text-field>
        <v-text-field
          :rules="[(v) => v.length <= 25 || 'Max 50 characters']"
          required
          :counter="25"
          single-line
          v-model="user.name_kana"
          label="名前(かな)"
        ></v-text-field>
        <v-radio-group v-model="user.gender" row>
          <v-radio label="男性" :value="1"></v-radio>
          <v-radio label="女性" :value="2"></v-radio>
        </v-radio-group>      
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn outlined color="primary">保存</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'
export default {
  name: 'UserControl',
  data: function () {
    return {
      users: []
    }
  },
  mounted: function(){
    axios.get('http://54.150.76.124/api/user')
    .then(response => (this.users = response.data))
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
